titleStmt.title: A discourse concerning the sovereign internal balsom wherein is intimated the ingredients, and method of its preparation; and a satisfactory account given of its great virtue, efficacy, and usefulnesse. With the manner of taking it, for the cure, and prevention of most diseases incident to humane bodies. By Thomas See, physitian. With allowance.
titleStmt.author: See, Thomas, fl. 1665.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Thomas Mabb, for Henry Ev[ersden], at the Grey-Hound in St. Pauls Church yard,

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and imprint date from Wing CD-ROM, 1996.
DFo copy, reel 2371, has a stain on the imprint affecting legibility.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..

place.placeName: the Grey-Hound in St. Pauls Church yard
